attributes.action: Stop activation of Article 50 so Britain will remain in the EU.
attributes.additional_details:
Here are two links showing that the people were mislead by the leave campaign:

https://twitter.com/bbcnewsnight/status/746466834610692096

https://www.facebook.com/lee.griffiths.7549/posts/10157020102730414
attributes.background: With revelations of the leave campaigns decieveing pledges about NHS £350 million per week funding and controlling immigration, It can be strongly argued that a debate must take place to rethink the activation of article 50 send Britain out of the Eu.
